notesStmt.note: Running title: An exposition vpon the Lords prayer.
Imperfect: p. 261 cropped at bottom with loss of print; p. 252-269 from defective University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
